attributes.action: set up during 2010 a Joint Coalition Government involving all the major political parties.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is proposedthat our country needs a Coalition Government just as we had during WW2. Currently our MP's are in disaray due to the "Expenses Scandal" and their apparent lack of moral/ethical values.Terrorism theatens our national security and our economy is in chaos with ever increasing levels of unemployment.We have a mountain of debt which is expected to increase to more than £600 BILLION over the next four years.Some experts predict that it will take more than a decade to sort out our financial problems. Surely we must put aside party political in-fighting and work together to sort out this mess?
